channel.title: Particle Mesh Referrals
channel.description:
If anyone is planning on pre-ordering any of the new Particle Mesh products, I would appreciate if you use my referral code: https://particle.io/mesh?referral=ZYS23X
Note that there is an adapter announced to be able to plug in the new Mesh products into headers for the classic Photon.
